article_title: Cognizant Snaps Up Marketing Agency Cadient To Boost Life Sciences Business - Page: 1

article_metadata.news_keywords: cognizant, cadient group, cognizant life sciences, cognizant healthcare, cognizant marketing, healthcare and life sciences
article_metadata.author: Sarah Kuranda

og.description: Cognizant has acquired digital marketing agency Cadient Group for an undisclosed amount in its second buy in the healthcare and life sciences space, the company said Tuesday.
